Name: Areenor
Description: You see a rather big man in plates of your Order standing near the north door. You recognize him - the man is called Areenor and he is the captain of your squad
Dialogue: Finally you arrived, the situation is pretty bad here. We don`t know what happened to local priests, but the living dead is all over the place. Rest of your group went down to dungeon, since the path to sanctuary is blocked. I literally can hear some ritual going over there. There should be wounded friend of yours in living quarters, check how he is filling firstly, he might have some armor and sword for you.
